title: Love Across Continents — Collage 1
caption: A collage highlighting key moments across different countries.
alt: Collage of couple photos from travels and celebrations
editNotes: Ensure readable text if any; export in WebP plus original JPEG; width 1920px + 960px variant.

title: Love Across Continents — Collage 2
caption: Continuation of the cross‑country story in images.
alt: Collage of couple portraits and travel scenes
editNotes: Match color grading with Collage 1 for consistency.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait A
caption: Full-length portrait beneath a floral arch.
alt: Couple standing under a white floral arch at night
editNotes: Slight highlight roll-off on sequins; export 2560w/1920w/1280w WebP.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait B
caption: Pose with gentle eye contact under floral canopy.
alt: Couple facing each other under floral canopy at night
editNotes: Crop to 3:4 for mobile hero; reduce green tint from stage lights.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait C (Alt)
caption: Alternate framing with similar pose.
alt: Couple smiling on decorated wedding stage
editNotes: Pick sharpest frame; unify white balance across set.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait C
caption: Slightly different angle showing attire details.
alt: Couple in traditional attire under floral arch
editNotes: Tone down specular highlights; noise reduction on shadows.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait D
caption: Closer stance with ornate backdrop.
alt: Couple posing on brightly lit stage with flowers
editNotes: Mind slight motion blur; keep as alternate.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait E (Alt)
caption: Alternate take with subtle posture change.
alt: Couple gazing at each other before floral arch
editNotes: Crop bottom to reduce empty floor; recover highlights.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait E
caption: Calm moment with flattering light.
alt: Couple smiling on wedding stage decorated with white flowers
editNotes: Good expression; prefer as hero candidate after highlight control.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait F
caption: Full outfit details captured front-on.
alt: Couple in traditional outfits on illuminated stage
editNotes: Slight warm temperature; balance to neutral.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait G
caption: Wide frame emphasizing arch symmetry.
alt: Couple under symmetrical floral arch with feather decor
editNotes: Great symmetry; crop to 16:9 for banners.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait H (Alt)
caption: Similar to Portrait H with minor variation.
alt: Couple posing beneath ornate arch at night
editNotes: Keep as supporting frame.

title: Wedding Stage — Portrait I (Alt)
caption: Alternate expression with stage decor prominent.
alt: Couple smiling on stage with floral arrangement
editNotes: Unify exposure with set; minor noise reduction.

title: Street Stroll — Frame A
caption: Daylight street portrait outside a luxury storefront.
alt: Couple on a city sidewalk near a reflective glass boutique
editNotes: Crop for symmetry; slight highlight control on pavement.

title: Street Stroll — Frame B
caption: Alternate angle from the same location.
alt: Couple smiling outside a boutique with palm reflections
editNotes: Choose one as primary; keep as alternate.

title: Rooftop at Dusk — Portrait A
caption: Close portrait on a rooftop at golden hour.
alt: Couple seated together on a rooftop at dusk with city in background
editNotes: Warm tone is pleasant; minimal edits.

title: Rooftop at Dusk — Portrait B
caption: Alternate framing from the same rooftop setting.
alt: Couple leaning together with soft evening light on a rooftop
editNotes: Match color with Portrait A.

title: Candid Indoors — Playful
caption: Playful indoor piggyback candid.
alt: One person giving another a piggyback indoors, candid moment
editNotes: Lift exposure slightly; reduce yellow cast; crop distractions.

title: Scenic Hike — Overlook
caption: Daylight hike with sweeping valley and city backdrop.
alt: Couple at a trail overlook with hills and city in distance
editNotes: Add gentle dehaze; protect highlights.

title: City Skyline — Black Tie A
caption: Formal portrait with dramatic skyline at night.
alt: Couple in formal wear with city skyscrapers at night behind them
editNotes: Lift shadows slightly; mild noise reduction.

title: City Skyline — Black Tie B
caption: Alternate stance with skyline and candles.
alt: Formal couple by pool with skyline lights at night
editNotes: Choose sharpest of the skyline set as feature.

title: City Skyline — Black Tie C
caption: Variation with slight repositioning.
alt: Formal couple on rooftop deck with skyscrapers at night
editNotes: Color-balance mixed lighting; reduce magenta cast.

title: City Skyline — Black Tie D
caption: Wider frame showcasing skyline context.
alt: Couple posing on rooftop with city skyline and pool reflections
editNotes: Great as banner after subtle denoise.

title: Cake Cutting — Moment A
caption: Action moment during cake cutting surrounded by guests.
alt: Couple cutting a tiered cake at a nighttime celebration
editNotes: Reduce specular highlights; subtle clarity on hands.

title: Cake Cutting — Moment B
caption: Alternate frame with crowd and decor visible.
alt: Cake cutting with guests around and city lights in background
editNotes: Tone down background hotspots; crop edge distractions.

title: Balcony Portrait — Hills A
caption: Daytime portrait on balcony with green hills.
alt: Couple standing on balcony with green hills and trees behind
editNotes: Control highlights on white clothing; gentle contrast.

title: Balcony Portrait — Hills B
caption: Alternate framing from the same balcony setting.
alt: Couple posing on balcony with blue sky and hills
editNotes: Match color to frame A.

title: Travel Day — Street Scene A
caption: Casual travel portrait in daylight.
alt: Couple posing outdoors during daytime travel
editNotes: Minor crop and exposure balance.

title: Travel Day — Street Scene B
caption: Alternate travel shot from same session.
alt: Casual outdoor portrait in daylight
editNotes: Choose one as primary; keep as alternate.

title: Evening Gathering — Portrait
caption: Evening portrait with soft ambient lighting.
alt: Couple standing outdoors in the evening under soft lights
editNotes: Warm up white balance slightly; gentle noise reduction.

title: Wedding Stage — Night A
caption: Full-length pose with ornate arch and pampas decor.
alt: Couple standing on wedding stage beneath white floral arch at night
editNotes: Excellent symmetry; crop to 16:9 for hero variant.

title: Wedding Stage — Night B
caption: Alternate pose with similar lighting.
alt: Couple looking at each other on illuminated wedding stage
editNotes: Balance exposure to reduce sparkle clipping.

title: Wedding Stage — Night C
caption: Variation focusing on attire details.
alt: Couple in embellished outfits under floral arch at night
editNotes: Sharpen slightly; reduce green cast from stage lighting.
